short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that shows metrics from the Learning Dashboard of Qrapids for UPC projects into the Taiga project management tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that shows metrics from the Learning Dashboard of Qrapids for UPC projects into the Taiga project management tool. This is part of a Final Project from UPC  .
